Table 12.9
Inventories and Sales in U.S. Manufacturing, 1950-1991


  YEAR        = Year
  SALES       = Sales in U.S. Manufacturing, Millions of $
  INVENTORIES = Inventories in U.S. Manufacturing, Millions of $

  YEAR    SALES    INVENTORIES
  1950     38596     59822
  1951     43356     70242
  1952     44840     72377
  1953     47987     76122
  1954     46443     73175
  1955     51694     79516
  1956     54063     87304
  1957     55879     89052
  1958     54021     87055
  1959     59729     92097
  1960     60827     94719
  1961     61159     95580
  1962     65662    101049
  1963     68995    105463
  1964     73682    111504
  1965     80283    120929
  1966     87187    136824
  1967     90918    145681
  1968     98794    156611
  1969    105812    170400
  1970    108352    178594
  1971    117023    188991
  1972    131227    203227
  1973    153881    234406
  1974    178201    287144
  1975    182412    288992
  1976    204386    318345
  1977    229786    350706
  1978    260755    400929
  1979    298328    452636
  1980    328112    510124
  1981    356909    547169
  1982    348771    575486
  1983    370501    591858
  1984    411427    651527
  1985    423940    665837
  1986    431786    664654
  1987    459107    711745
  1988    496334    767387
  1989    522344    813018
  1990    540788    835985
  1991    533838    828184
